title: Heirloom Ruby & Polki Diamond Gutapusalu Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Seed Pearls. Features authentic Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Gutapusalu Haaram showcases a cascading pendant meticulously crafted with intricate floral motifs using uncut Polki diamonds. A central, cabochon-cut Burmese ruby steals the show, surrounded by delicate seed pearl accents. The multi-strand necklace features tightly strung ruby beads interspersed with tiny seed pearls, culminating in a royal and opulent design.
colors: and warm gold tones create a regal and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. A statement piece for Muhurtham ceremonies and significant celebrations.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece. The exquisite craftsmanship, using high-quality Burmese rubies and uncut Polki diamonds, ensures enduring beauty and value. The Gutapusalu design symbolizes prosperity and abundance, making it an auspicious choice for brides and celebratory events. A true testament to South Indian artistry and elegance.
